entry.title: MY BIGGEST FAILURE
entry.content:
My experience of Failure

In February 2019, I took part in the WSC debate at Beijing Duwei High School. Although I had had a lot of debating training in junior high school and had participated in relevant competitions, in this competition our group won only one of a total of four competitions. In the debate, we were behind our rivals in terms of language expression, logic, vocabulary range and so on. This event has become the biggest failure in my life.

WSC was my first international debating competition, and also the first time I had talked and competed with foreign students. In order to represent the strongest foreign language school in Nanjing, I prepared for a whole month for the competition. First of all, I studied the hot topics in 2018, such as whether schools should allow homeless people to attend and other social issues. At the same time, I also predicted the problems that would appear in 2019.

However, when our team started to confidently debate, we soon found a lot of fatal error besides the topics. First of all, our debate required us to speak only in English, and in preparation, we hadn’t had enough time to organize our language and come up with more accurate words to express our views. In just one minute, we couldn’t find much evidence to support our argument. What’s more, some of our opponents had strong accents, which made it difficult for us to understand what they were saying. So we lost a lot of points as we couldn’t refute our opponent’s argument. The biggest problem was the range of vocabulary. There were a lot of specialized words that I didn’t know from the large amount of materials we researched, so I wasn’t able to pronounce many words accurately and some sentences were grammatically incorrect. More importantly, I didn’t bring the flu into my speech. Most of the time, I looked at my manuscript and therefore gave my opinions mechanically, lacking a sense of communication with the judges compared with my opponents. I think these are the reasons why I failed.

Although the result of this debate was unsatisfactory, I think this failure has given me a lot of experience and taught me some lessons. In order to achieve better results in this year’s competition, I have improved my spoken English. At the same time, I have also participated in more school debating competitions to practice my spoken English I hope I can do better in this year’s competition and be in the top 20 in the debate awards.

Lessons learnt In the process of participating in debating competitions are not limited just to the debating competition, they can also be applied to our college life and later life. In college life, we have to use English to communicate our own ideas with other students. If we have the ability to speak well , other students will understand our ideas faster. It is the same in the future job search. Fluent expression and clear thinking are essential to get high marks in an interview.

entry.title: POEM
entry.content:
The definition of angel became meaningful

The childhood we spend together can’t be more wonderful

When I saw you for the first time

Forever filled with the smell of thyme

You sparkling shone in the night sky like a diamond

But I had no different from millions of grains of sand

And I was just a common boy thin and short

Wore clothes stained with dirt

Now I am different—although still too shy and scared to talk to you

I protected you in the darkness without letting you knew

in the long narrow alley near your home

Your shadow receded into a faint foam

You should marry me because I’m the Mr.Right

Thousands of night, I studied under the dim light

Waited for the moment that I can stand by your side

And now, I can afford you the gleaming Tiffany diamond

My mother also says you will be the best choice of our family

Let her see me get married and have sons quickly

She sacrificed so much to cultivate me alone, and in turn, I should fulfill her wish

We, together, can raise three sons like me——reward parents for their care and nourish

you should marry me, because I know there’s no better choice

So do not hesitate and seize the chance

I’ll be a good father of our kids

Now, make your decision with a wise sense

entry.title: Opinion about using ESC
entry.content:
I agree with the third opinion which allows scientists to do experiment with embryos with some limitations. The embryo researches done by scientists have made great contributions in the scientific and medical fields. In the medical field, Scientists have created organ transplants using the properties of embryonic stem cells that can develop into all cells except the placenta. In the future, there is no need for patients to wait for the donor organ anymore. This can greatly increase the survival rate of patients. On the other hand, with the development of embryonic stem cell research, our cloning technology has become more and more advanced. After we can clone complete animals, this technology can be used in many areas. For example, we can save endangered animals by cloning to protect and spread the species resources of animals. Moreover, we can also breed better animals to ensure the reduction of endangered species.

Although these researches play an important role in promoting human development, we still need to pay attention to moral and ethical issues. In my opinion, as the embryos develop, their mortal status increases. By the 14th day of embryonic stem cells’ development, the ‘primitive streak’ begins to appear, which means that the cells have nervous system. As soon as the cells have nervous system, they will have consciousness and sensory feeling which means they have acquired human characteristics. That’s why our world made 14-day role to protect the embryos. On the other hand, I think the field where embryo researches can be applied should also be limited. All researches must be applied to areas that can help people, such as health care, environmental protection and so on. Research for the purpose of harming humans should be considered crime such as the manufacture of poison gas.

In the future, I think IPSC can replace ESC. IPSC is that people make adult cells lose their function and structure to make them into undifferentiated cells. In this process, we can effectively avoid using embryos and other controversial experimental materials. At the same time, IPSC can be widely collected, not like the scarcity of embryo resources. The total cost of the experiments will be much lower if we use IPSC.

entry.title: POEM 2 REVISING
entry.content:
‘Bent double, like old beggars under sacks,

Knock-kneed, coughing like hags, we cursed through sludge,

Till on the haunting flares we turned our backs

And towards our distant rest began to trudge.

Men marched asleep. Many had lost their boots

But limped on, blood-shod. All went lame; all blind;

Drunk with fatigue; deaf even to the hoots

Of disappointed shells that dropped behind.’

‘Takh, takh’, the gates of hell have been opened

The locust - like imp pounced on the crowd

Fear, panic, despair was darkened

Blood sputtered; all men died after one pace out.

Arms, legs, helmets with bullet holes,

Screech and shot are inundated with this piece of land.

Rifle, Gatling, ruthless roles,

Nonstop shooting kills the last firebrand.

Death was admiring from the other side of the field

the legendary work he was accomplishing.

winds with offensive smell of blood rolled over the weald

carrying souls of the suffering

The mutilated limbs piled up into black and white bushes

nourished by the blood and resistance

The fire flickered again in his eyes

When hearing the horn in the distance

As he raised hand and slowly dimmed the light,

The cruel sickle had been swung

‘My friend, you would not tell with such high zest

To children ardent for some desperate glory,

The old Lie: Dulce et decorum est

Pro patria mori.’

entry.title: Reflections about doing part-time job
entry.content:
During the first semester of my second year in high school, I had a lot of free time. So I found a famous restaurant in Nanjing as a part-time job. I do eight hours of part-time work every Saturday. My job is to simply deliver food and clear the table. I didn’t think it would be difficult at first. But when it came down to it, it was really painful.

First of all, some guests like to order a lot of food. This made the size of the tableware he used different, which caused me a lot of trouble in cleaning the table. Moreover, some food scraps will be scattered on the table, and I have to clean them carefully with napkins. The second is the workload. Saturday is a time for many people to go out. The restaurant where I work is in the mall, so the population is even greater. There are peaks at noon and at night. I didn’t have time to take a rest in that hour or two. I was working all the time. It’s a very common phenomenon that the desk can’t be cleaned up on time. What makes me tired is that I only have one hour of rest a day, and I have to stand and take care of the guests for the rest of the day. Every time I get off work, my feet ache.

After experiencing the hard work of the working people at the grassroots level in China, I learned how happy I was to be able to go to school. In the service industry, the payment of service personnel is not directly proportional to their wages. They do the same job every day, working late into the night with little pay. In order to avoid this situation in my future, I must study hard, be a mental worker, and make more contributions to the society.

entry.title: reflection about basic language of Python
entry.content:
Introduction

Python is the first computer programming language I learnt so that I have some thoughts to share about my experience. Compared with human mind, in some ways computer works the same. Most of the programs I learnt so far work based on two logic: True or False and if or else. Computer will make choice according to the content we type in just like human. However, I want to talk more about differences between computer language and human language. When we give somebody an order, we focus on the thesis, details are not so important. Nevertheless, it is totally different in computer language. Every detail must be correct in the code we type, such as the indented block, the symbol, the format of your code and even a blank. If there is only one mistake, the whole program will not work. On the other hand, symbols in computer language are have different meaning compared with it in math. For example, when we want two Boolean values equal, we need to type ‘==’ instead of ‘=’. As a beginner, I have a lot of trouble to use correct symbols when I write code.

Impression

I used to have a question after a few weeks’ learning: Computer is used to help us work more convenient and quickly, but why I seem to spend more time on writing a program? I can finish it much more quickly by myself. The problem bothered me until the teacher gave us an example: A teacher wants to know 10 students average mark after he puts10 results in. I just spent 3 minutes to finish the code instead of adding 10 marks and dividing 10. In my opinion, computer is just a like a little child which only can do any complex calculation and never forget things. In order to let him to solve difficult questions, I need to teach him how to do it and I only teach him once. After that, I just need to type my data and he will give me the answer. I think that is the reason we learn the different computer language.

A flowchart is an important step in writing a program. Flowcharts show the logic you need to write a program in a simple way, helping us tease out the key steps. There are only two sections of the flow chart: the execution section and the judgment section.

Examples

Now I am going to introduce some program that I write.

First program is help customers order their food. During rush hours, many artificial Windows may become. If shop manager can add the self-service ordering machine in the store can greatly reduce the labor workload, in McDonald’s now has such equipment.

Second one is to calculate the monthly payment in a bank. It is extremely difficult for beginners like me to calculate all kinds of figures. Not only the meaning of some data is professional, but also the complex calculation annoy me a lot. That’s the reason that I strongly suggest to use this kind of program.

Here is a flowchart I drew while writing the program. This is a simple login procedure just like QQ. When you put correct name and password in, it will let you pass. We can see that only a simple procedure needs a amount of code and logic, so it is necessary to draw a flowchart.
